body:
Logger engine: https://github.com/pinojs/pino
Lazy logging middleware: https://github.com/link-foundation/log-lazy

We should enable lazy logging to JSON, as our output also in JSON across all our output.

So everything should be parsable (both output and logs) as JSON.

If that is log statement, we should put in in `{ log: { ... } }` so we have definite way to saparate regular output from all kind of logs.

As we use `https://github.com/link-foundation/log-lazy` we should prefer construction of output JSON objects inside functions always, so these function will not be executed, when --verbose mode is disabled.
title: Make JSON lazy logging across the CLI app
